step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more stable during this part of the roll.
Excellent! You're effectively bringing your shoulders forward and down. Focus on keeping your left elbow and wrists a little steadier as you complete the circle.
Great job completing the circular motion! For the next repetitions, aim to keep your wrists and elbows a bit more aligned with your body to enhance the shoulder movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your elbows and wrists steady to focus the movement on your shoulders.
